definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="440" y="73"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">FLAME</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/summon area_effect_cloud ~ ~ ~ {Particle:"flame",Radius:2f,Duration:10,Effects:[{Id:"the_source:flamethrower_burn"}]}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
